org.jcvi.jillion.sam

Interface SamRecord

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SamAttributed

    public interface SamRecord
extends SamAttributed
    SamRecord is an interface for the object representation of a single alignment in a SAM or BAM encoded file.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Detail

      • isPrimary

        boolean isPrimary()
        Is this the primary alignment for this read. Some assemblers may also provide alternate alignments for some reads. In that case, this flag will distinguish the primary alignment's record from the alternate records.
        Returns:
        true if this record is the primary; false otherwise.

      • useForAnalysis

        boolean useForAnalysis()
        Should this record be used in analysis. Some records should be excluded from downstream analysis due to quality or sequencing error concerns.
        Returns:
        true if this record is the should be used for analysis; false otherwise.

      • getQueryName

        String getQueryName()
        Get the query name of this record, this is usually the sequence read's name; but may be set to UNAVAILABLE if the name is not known.
        Returns:
        the Query name as a String or UNAVAILABLE.

      • getReferenceName

        String getReferenceName()
        Get the reference name that this record aligns to.
        Returns:
        The name of the reference or UNAVAILABLE if the record either didn't align or the reference name wasn't provided.

      • getNextName

        String getNextName()

      • getFlags

        SamRecordFlags getFlags()
        Get all the SamRecordFlagss present in this record. Please note, that some of the common tests and checks for the presence/absence of some flags or groups of flags are methods.
        Returns:
        the unmodifiable set of SamRecordFlags.
        See Also:
        mapped(), isPrimary(), useForAnalysis(), getDirection()

      • getStartPosition

        int getStartPosition()

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object

      • toString

        String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • mapped

        boolean mapped()
        Did this record map to one of the references.
        Returns:
        true if the record mapped somewhere; false otherwise.

      • getDirection

        Direction getDirection()
        Get the Direction that this read mapped in. If the read didn't map, then the direction will be Direction.FORWARD.
        Returns:
        Direction.REVERSE if the read mapped in reverse; Direction.FORWARD otherwise.

      • getAlignmentRange

        Range getAlignmentRange()
        Get the alignment Range that this record mapped to along the reference. The returned Range is the range used to compute the Bin in indexed bai files.
        Returns:
        a Range for this record's alignment, or null if this record didn't map.
